content: X-P P8 Universal nails Ultimate-performance single nail for fastening to concrete and other base materials using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for fastening on tough concrete (tested and approved for 8000 psi concrete, up to 25mm | 1 embedment) Long conical nail tip designed for best drivability in tough concrete Highest hardness (59 HRC) for best penetration in tough concrete Provides effective embedment depths of 20mm, 25mm, 31mm, and 38mm (3/4, 1, 1 1/4 and 1 1/2) when used with tracks up to 14 ga thick Highest load performance on tough concrete Applications Fastening to soft or tough concrete Fastening drywall track to concrete Fastening wall ties Fastening wood to concrete Setting up formwork and safety barriers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick) Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 80 mm Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.16 in | Point type | Long conical tip | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 3808095 - KIT X-P 22 P8+6.8/11 M10T TITANIUM - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 100x Concrete nail X-P 22 P8 - 100x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10 T titanium C-T - 2150366 - Concrete nail X-P 22 P8 - Package Size 100 pc -
